Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Membro del comitato editoriale della rivista Metodo. International Studies in Phenomenology and Philosophy

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Internationale Tagung der deutschen Gesellschaft für phänomenologische Forschungen, Universität Darmstadt. Title of the talk: “Raum. Zeit, Bewegung. Überlegungen zur dynamischen Auffassung der Subjektivität bei Edmund Husserl und Erwin Straus”.
Graduate Conference, Istituto Banfi Reggio Emilia. Title of the talk: “Archeologia del sensibile. Spazialità e temporalità nell’estetica trascendentale fenomenologica di Edmund Husserl”.
Graduate Conference, Istituto Italiano per le Scienze Umane, Florence. Title of the talk: “Il progetto di un’estetica trascendentale fenomenologica nel pensiero di E. Husserl”.
Doctoral Workshop, Husserl Archiv Köln. Title of the talk: “Die raum-zeitliche Konfiguration der Erfahrung bei Husserl. Überlegungen zum Begriff der Situation”.

Annual Conference of the Nordic Society for Phenomenology, University of Tampere. Title of the talk: “Perspective, Movement and the Spatio-Temporal Configuration of Experience in Husserl’s Phenomenology”.
Husserls Arbeitstage “Normalität und Normativität in der Lebenswelt”, Universität Freiburg. Title of the talk: “Normalität und Normativität in Husserls Phänomenologie der sinnlichen Erfahrung”.

Doctoral and Post-Doctoral Conference “Phänomenologie der Subjektivität und Intersubjektivität“, Bergische Universität Wuppertal. Title of the talk: “Das leibliche Gedächtnis. Ein phänomenologischer Verständnisversuch”.
Winter School “The Phenomenological Mind” Phenomenology and the Cognitive Sciences, Università San Raffaele, Milan. Title of the talk: “Body Memory. A Phenomenological Account”.
International Workshop “Body Memory, Metaphors and Movement” Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg. Title of the talk: “A Husserlian Approach to Body Memory”.
International Conference “Husserl domani”. Università di Tor Vergata, Rome. Title of the talk: “(Un-)Selbstverständlichkeit. La naturalezza interrotta tra Husserl e Blankenburg.”

Interdisciplinary conference “Leibgedächtnis und Therapie” Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg. Title of the talk: “Zwischen Anderem und Drittem. Leibgedächtnis und Zeugenschaft”. (Paper and Organization)
42nd Annual Meeting of the Husserl Circle, Gonzaga University Florence. Title of the talk: “Process and Relation. Husserl’s Theory of Individuation Revisited”.

Conference: “Phänomenologie der Dinge” - Deutschen Gesellschaft für Phänomenologische Forschungen, Humboldt Universität Berlin. Title of the talk: “Der Gegenstand ohne Begriff und die Schichtung der Erfahrung bei Kant und Husserl”.

Husserls Arbeitstage “Natur und Geist in der Sicht der Phänomenologie”, Husserl Archiv Köln. Title of the talk: “Zwischen Erinnern und Vergessen. Implizites Leibgedächtnis und das Selbst am Beispiel der Demenz Erkrankung”.

Workshop “Verkörperte Sprache - Versprachlichte Körper”, Universität Freiburg, Herrmann Paul School of Language Science. Title of the talk:”Embodied Meaning. Ein phänomenologischer Verständnisversuch”

International Conference “Husserl und die klassische deutsche Philosophie”, University of Parma. Title of the talk: “Der Gegenstand ohne Begriff und die Schichtung der Erfahrung bei Husserl und Kant”.

Interdisciplinary Workshop: “Remembering in Context”. Zentrum für interdisziplinäre Forschung, Bielefeld. Title of the talk: “Body Memory: Phenomenological Approach and Empirical Findings” (joint presentation with PD Dr. Sabine Koch).

Interdisciplinary Conference: “Die Grenzen der Kontrolle? Vernunft und Gefühl zwischen Philosophie und Psychiatrie”. University of Freiburg. Title of the talk: “Gefühl, Emotion und Erinnerung beim traumatisierten Selbst. Eine Frage der Kohärenz?”

International Workshop “Phänomenologische Perspektiven auf Kant”. University of Vienna. Title of the talk: “Ein sinnloses Gewühl? Die Möglichkeit des Chaos und ihre Implikationen bei Husserl und Kant”.
nternational Conference: “The Implication of Embodiment. Enactive, Psychical, Social”. University of Heidelberg. Title of the talk: “Body Memory and the Traumatized Self. A Matter of Coherence?"

Husserl-Arbeitstage “Feeling and Value - Willing and Action”. University of Leuven. Title of the talk: “Are Emotions “Recollected in Tranquillity”? Phenomenological Reflections on Emotions, Memory,and the Self”.

Conference “Ästhetisches Wissen: Zwischen Sinnlichkeit und Begriff”. Technische Universität Berlin. Title of the talk: Ein sinnloses Gewühl? Die Möglichkeit des Chaos und die sinnliche Regelmäßigkeit bei Husserl und Kant.

Summer School “Embodied Intersubjectivity: From the 1st person to the 2nd  person perspective”. Aegina, Greece. Title of the talk (poster presentation): “Pretense and the Flexibility of Perspective Taking”.
44th Meeting of the Husserl Circle. Karl Franzens Universität Graz. Title of the talk: “The Zero-point of Orientation and the Bodily Anchoring of the First-person-perspective”.

Conference: “Soziale Erfahrung” - Deutsche Gesellschaft für Phänomenologische Forschungen. Universität Köln. Title of the talk: “Phantasie, Interaktion und Perspektivenübernahme in Als-Ob-Situationen. Eine phänomenologische Analyse”.

Conference “Edmund Husserl: logica, significato, percezione”. Università Roma Tre. Title of the talk: “Perception as Enaction? Phenomenological Reflections on Perspectival Givenness and the Dynamics of Perceptual Constitution”
Workshop “Erkenntnis durch Interaktion”. Universität Heidelberg. Title of the talk: “Pretense and the Flexibility of Perspective-taking”. (Paper and organization)
Workshop “Representing the Speech of Others”. University of Groningen. Title of the talk: “The phenomenology of pretense. Typological Recognition, Phantasy, and social Understanding”.

Workshop “Intersubjektivität, Interaktion und Perspektivenübernahme” Universität Heidelberg. Title of the talk: “Imagination and Intersubjectivity in Pretense. The role of Perspective-Taking”. (Paper and organization)

Conference “‘As-if’ - Figures of imagination, simulation, and transpositions in the relation to the self, others, and the arts”. Villa Vigoni Loveno di Menaggio. Title of the talk: “Pretense and Perspective-Taking between Phantasy and Enacting”.

37. International Wittgenstein Symposium “Analytic and Continental Philosophy: Methods and Perspectives”. Title of the talk: “Is a World without Pretense Imaginable? Reflections on Asymmetry and Intransparency”.
Workshop “Embodied Perception and the Human World” University of Limerick. Title of the talk: “Embodiment between Perception, Acknowledgement, and Interaction”
Workshop “Edith Stein and Phenomenology” University College Dublin. Title of the talk: “Direct Perception, Imagination, and the Levels of Empathy”.

Conference “Imagination, Intersubjectivity and Perspective-Taking” - Villa Vigoni, Loveno di Menaggio. Title of the talk: “Imaginative Dimensions of Reality:Pretense, Knowledge, and Sociality” (Paper and Organization)

Conference „Phenomenologie und deutscher Idealismus“, University of Saint Petersburg. Title of the talk: “Towards a Transcendental Account of Creativity. Kant and Merleau-Ponty on the Creative power of Judgment and Creativity as Institution”.

Conference „Menschliche Natur jenseits der Naturalisierung“, Warschau, Polish Academy of Sciences. Title of the talk: “Gefühl, Emotion und Erinnerung beim traumatisierten Selbst. Eine Frage der Kohärenz’”.
Conference “Women Phenomenologists in Social Ontology”, University of Paderborn. Title of the talk: “Empathy and Anti-Empathy. Which Are the Problems?”.
Conference “Productive Imagination: Its History, Meaning, and Significance”, Chinese University Hong Kong. Title of the talk: “Make-believe, Fiction, and Productive Imagination”.
Scientific Organization of the Summer School "Intention and Attention. A Joint Venture between Phenomenology and the History of Philosophy" - Würzburg University + Joint lecture with Prof. K. Mertens
Affectivity and Animality. Shifting boundaries in Phenomenology. Paper: The Pathic Dimension of Play. A reassessment
Workshop 'Imagination: Possibilities and Necessities of Experience' KU Leuven - Title of the talk: "Experiencing reality and fiction: Discontinuity and permeability"

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Seminar “Zeitlichkeit und Gedächtnis” (Time and Memory) with Thomas Fuchs, Stefano Micali and Boris Wandruszka - University of Heidelberg .
Seminar “Phänomenologie der Zeitlicheit” (Phenomenology of Time) with Thomas Fuchs, Stefano Micali and Boris Wandruszka - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar “Phänomenologie der Intersubjektivität und Fremderfahrung” (Phenomenology of Intersubjectivity and the Experience of Others) - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar: “Husserls Phänomenologie der Imagination und Phantasie” (Husserl’s Phenomenology of Imagination and Phantasy) - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar: “Freiheit, Schuld und Gewissen” (Freedom, Guilt, and Conscience) with Thomas Fuchs, Stefano Micali and Boris Wandruszka - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar “Psychopathologie und Kino” (Psychopathology and Cinema) with Zeno van Duppen and Till Grohmann - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar “Imagination und Unwirklichkeit bei Fink und Sartre” (Imagination and Unreality in Fink and Sartre) - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar “Ausdruck, Erfahrung und Intersubjektivität” (Expression, Experience, and Intersubjectivity) with Thomas Fuchs, Monika Dullstein and Sonja Frohoff - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar “Fremderfahrung und Gefühle in Schelers Wesen und Formen der Sympathie” (Experience of Others and Feelings in Scheler’s The Nature of Sympathy) - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar “Psyché. Versuch einer Positionsbestimmung des Seelischen” (Psyché. Towards a Definition of the Position of the Soul) with Thomas Fuchs and Jan-Ivar Lindén - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar “Psychopathologie und Kino II” (Psychopathology and Cinema II) with Zeno van Duppen - University of Heidelberg.
Seminar “Einfühlung und Fremderfahrung: Phänomenologie und die Theory of Mind Debatte” (Empathy and the Experience of Others: Phenomenology and the Theory of Mind Debate) - University of Würzburg.
Seminar “Gilbert Ryle: The Concept of Mind” – University of Würzburg.
Seminar “Hume: A Treatise of Human Nature” - University of Würzburg.
Seminar: “Husserl: Logische Untersuchungen” (Logical Investigations) - University of Würzburg.
Seminar “Philosophie der Imagination und Bildbewusstsein” (Phenomenology of Imagination and Image Consciousness) - University of Würzburg.
Seminar “Husserls Formale und transzendentale Logik” (Husserl’s “Formal and Transcenental Logic”) - University of Würzburg.
Seminar “Scham und Schuld” (Shame and Guilt) - University of Würzburg.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Progetto interdisciplinare 'Körpersprache von Tanz und Bewegung'; Universitätsklinikum Heidelberg - Finanziato dal Bundesministerium für Bildung un Forschung (BMBF)
Progetto interdisciplinare 'Erkenntnis durch Interaktion' - Universitätsklinikum Heidelberg - Finanziato dalla Volkswagen Stiftung
Netzwerk 'Phänomenologie und Metaphysik', finanziato dalla Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG)

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Olympia Morata Research Grant (Habilitationsförderung). Heidelberg University
2016 Edward Goodwin Ballard Book Prize in Phenomenology for the book “Spatio-temporal Intertwining, Husserl’s Transcendental Aesthetic.”
